source.9f7008ba:
import plotly.graph_objects as go

fig = go.Figure()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=hybrid_papaya['date'], y=hybrid_papaya['min_dollars'], mode='lines+markers', name='min_dollars'))

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=hybrid_papaya['date'], y=hybrid_papaya['max_dollars'], mode='lines+markers', name='max_dollars'))

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=hybrid_papaya['date'], y=hybrid_papaya['mode_dollars'], mode='lines+markers', name='mode_dollars'))

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=hybrid_papaya['date'], y=hybrid_papaya['avg_dollars'], mode='lines+markers', name='avg_dollars'))

fig.show()

import plotly.express as px


fig = px.box(multiple_fruits, x="product", y="avg_dollars", points="all")

fig.show()
